bio:treatment.discussion: l. Plants small, stems 1–6(–10) cm, usually densely foliate; leaf margins serrulate to strongly serrate in distal half; costa papillose to spinose distally on abaxial surface; distal laminal cells short-rectangular to quadrate, mostly 18–23 µm long; seta mostly shorter than 2.5 cm

key_statement.description: Plants large, stems 8–18 cm, sparsely foliate; leaf margins nearly entire; costa almost smooth on abaxial surface; distal laminal cells irregularly rounded, elliptic or short- rectangular, mostly 9–19 µm long; seta usually 2.5 cm long or more
